name: Reversi 2 players
description:
Reversi is a strategy board game for two players, which is the most popular turn based game, played on an 8×8 board look like chess board. There are sixty-four identical game pieces called disks or discs, which are light (White disk) on one side and dark (Black disk) on the other.

Players have to think and find out the well strategy to take turns placing disks on the board with their assigned color facing up. During a play, any disks of the opponent's color that are in a straight line and bounded by the disk just placed and another disk of the current player's color are turned over to the current player's color.

Try to take turn as more disks as you possible to beat your opponent.

No In-App purchase, no casino feature, free at all, free to learn and challenge.

There are 5 opponents to challenge from easy to hard:
- A Lucky Child: He is just 9 years old. This is the easiest level.
- Pretty Girl: She is beautiful, she is smart, she is 20 years old. This is medium level.
- Gentlemen: He is handsome, he is 39 years old, he is sober. This is hard level.
- Master: He is old, he is the master. You must have patience to play with him.
- Grand Master: He is very old, excellent at reversi.

Special Features only in Reversi 2017:
- You can review your match after playing game.
- You can use unlimited undo.
- You can allow AI turn first.
- Very Brilliant UI, excellent graphic, magic animation.
- Pretty sound and music, vibrate when the turn is blocked.
- Sign in and view leaderboard.
- Can play with friends in 2 players mode.

Nice time to play Reversi 2017.
